Name: scrum_master_is_experienced
Description: Scrum Master must have a certain level of experience.

Name: task_is_not_done
Description: Task status must not be 'done' to be considered for work.

Name: blocker_is_open
Description: Blocker status must be 'open' to be considered.

Name: sprint_is_planned
Description: Sprint must be in 'planned' status to add user stories.

Name: user_story_is_defined
Description: User Story must have acceptance criteria defined.

Name: feature_is_approved
Description: Feature must have the status 'approved' to be included in a release plan.

Name: worker_has_skill
Description: Worker must possess the required skill for a task.

Name: team_size_is_valid
Description: Team size must be greater than 2.
